website_summaries.verdict: Panasonic's compact Lumix DMC-ZS30 features a long 20x zoom lens and integrated Wi-Fi, NFC, and GPS, but image quality disappoints.
cons: Does not include external battery charger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Compact Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this camera now for a while and can not say enough good things about it. It may not take DSLR quality photos but they are nearly so and more than good enough for everyday shooting and this thing fits in your pocket along with a 20x lens!!!!! What matters in digital cameras most is the glass (lens) they use. This Leica is fantastic and compact. If you are considering this camera along with others I would say you can't go wrong with the ZS30! I will add more info and some example images latter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my 5th Lumix DMC camera and for good reasons..the camera is compact, with lots of features and a Leica zoom lens system
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Lumix DMC-ZS30 to replace my older ZS20. The camera has many features that are important for prosumer photographers. It has a 30 times zoom range, RAW capability, GPS, a viewfinder for more stable photography and a Leica zoom system. I am retired and a serious photographer but often I prefer to carry a compact camera. The GPS is especially nice when traveling in Europe or areas in which I am not familiar. I really appreciate the addition of the RAW capability as the quality of the photos is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera and all its features. For its size, it is very powerful, and I can tuck it in a pocket and still be able to take great pictures, videos, and panoramas. Its anti-shake mode is wonderful. On a recent vacation, I was on a tour bus, shooting one-handed and I still got some good shots. It also has a very fast start up and recovery time. At the same time, it is good for more artistic work. My only wish is that it had an external battery charger, so that I don't have to plug in the camera to charge the battery. (I did get three extra batteries for my trip and that worked well.)
customer_reviews.author: Barb Ross

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good camera, loaded with features, sub-par picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought the comparable canon. I got better pictures with my previous Canon than I did with this. I mainly got this for the HDR and Panorama settings. HDR is great, but the panorama pictures aren't as good as I had hoped. I also have the underwater housing and the underwater pictures aren't as good as my old Canon either. Guess I should have stuck with Canon instead of going for the features in this model.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Leatherman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, awesome camera.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new camera with GPS capability for work, picked this up. This camera is nothing short of AMAZING. In every aspect. Ease of use, long battery life (yes, the GPS function will drain the battery quicker, but you can always take the battery OUT when not using it), quick between photos, etc. The GPS function by the way is awesome, and this camera picks up a signal almost instantaneously. Cannot say enough good things about it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I am a happy customer.I have taken photos and video and the quality is amazing.I have taken night photos and they came out perfect.....low light quality is the best I have seen. Battery life is OK,I would suggest getting a heavy duty one for longer battery life.Setting up the WiFi was a slow process but I think that was do to my lack of knowledge of the internet and other factors.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: More than meets the eye!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a surprise for my wife before she goes on a trip. The description of the Lumix doesn't begin to explain all the features that the camera actually has. It gives the ability to take some fantastic photos, and then manipulate them in a variety of manures if you should choose. I'm very happy with this purchase, and will recommend it to anyone who loves to take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: mgrynder

customer_reviews.title: ... to South Africa with me and got the most amazing shots of wildlife without lugging around giant lenses
customer_reviews.text: Took this to South Africa with me and got the most amazing shots of wildlife without lugging around giant lenses. LOVE this camera. Can't recommend it enough. My brother, who is a professional photographer and a perfectionist, found it for me online and said it's an amazing bargain. If you're looking for something in this price range and this is available, grab it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie W

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have many small cameras, but this is the one I seem to grab most. I am no longer willing to drag professional equipment around as the small stuff has gotten so much better. Wish it shot RAW but don't want the expense of upgrading to the ZS40. I'll wait for prices to drop after the next model after that arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Kimball Corson

customer_reviews.title: So happy to find one of these travel sized cameras in ...
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find one of these travel sized cameras in excellent used condition at a reasonable price. Had a very early version of this model that produced some very good photos until the shutter jammed after about 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: pamsaunt

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a kind of surprise for me ... made a lot of research but still I was not so confident on the GPS ... but it really works fine, does not consume that much batterie .... Another aspect that is amazing is the flash quality which is subtle enough to not blank a close subject. The only thing that would be improved is the power button .... it would be a little higher and easy to find ....
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at lots of cameras and reading many reviews, I finally settled on this one and have been very happy with it. I love the compact size (and the fact that it fits my old Lumix case) - it is easy to have on me for any photo opportunity. The 20x zoom was less than many of the others but it's plenty enough for most purposes. I wanted manual capability but thus far have not even used it as it does quite well in intelligent mode. I've only had it a month so I'm looking forward to learning how to use the more in-depth features over time. Bang for the buck - it Rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Lumix Pocket Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was delivered in a few days in great condition. I was surprised that it needed a memory card out of the box, but I love the functionality in such a compact package, though it is definitely bigger in all directions than my trusty Lumix ZR3. High zoom and stable, clear pictures. I was disappointed that the extra batteries from my broken Lumix ZR3 are so similar but do not fit. The main fault with this camera is that it does not have an optical viewfinder. Using it in the sun on the beach is nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Probably an even higher rating after I understand it more.
customer_reviews.text: Got it to replace a similar panasonic I lost. Have had 4 of them now and have always been very pleased by their quality-particularly the lenses. And all seem to be excellent for whatever level of picture taker you might be. Great size too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Dillman

customer_reviews.title: Pansonic DMC-ZS30
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Panasonic camera. This one has al the features and benefit you want and need in a point and shoot camera and WOW does it take great pictures. The ZOOM is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Laurette Wood

customer_reviews.title: ... HAVE HAD DIFFERENT LUMIX CAMERAS AND SO UPSET THAT BEST BUY HAS STOPPED SELLING THESE CAMERAS
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD DIFFERENT LUMIX CAMERAS AND SO UPSET THAT BEST BUY HAS STOPPED SELLING THESE CAMERAS..I HAVE BOUGHT QUITE A FEW OF THEM CAUSE IF THEY STOP MAKING THIS BRAND AND MODEL I HAVE A COUPLE IN RESERVE Headline for your review View tips and guidelines Add a photo Submit BM Premium Pack of 2 DMW-BCM13E Batteries and... Big Mike's S..WISH THEY COULD GET THEM BACK I OWN A FEW DIF MODELS BECAUSE I DONT WANT THEM TO STOP MAKING THEM...CRAZY ABOUT THEM
customer_reviews.author: kay davis

customer_reviews.title: Early days, but this one is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I use mostly my Nikon DSLR, but when it is too bulky for the day I wanted a good point and shoot and this is far better than my older Canons which were good in the day. Has some nice features and the pictures are good. Wish they would put raw capture in these very costly point and shoot models, though.
customer_reviews.author: Approachable

customer_reviews.title: I like the camera so far but it can do sooo ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera so far but it can do sooo much that you need a little time to study it. But everything seems to load quickly and simply. I do wish things still came with a "book" instead of instructions on line that you have to print. But I am very happy with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Belger

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Compact but with advanced features. Excellent image quality. Ease of handling and good positioning of controls. As good a camera as I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: merfey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to replace my old ones (Canon & Sony) which both had dust spots on the lenses/mirror which I could not get rid of. This camera was the easiest to learn by far and takes great zoom photos! Hopefully it will remain dust free. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dahank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great compact camera, takes awesome videos with crisp images and various resolutions
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Remote View Finding is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Remote View Finding is Excellent. I use my Galaxy SII Smartphone as a viewfinder to take photos in recessed building areas that are otherwise inaccessible.
customer_reviews.author: Marty's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good Features, had to return for refurb
customer_reviews.text: I like the features on this camera; had a DMC-ZS3 before. However, I had to return the DMC-ZS30 for warranty service because the GPS never worked. Panasonic exchanged it for a refurb after 70 days at the service center (waiting for parts).
customer_reviews.author: b.l.drag0n

customer_reviews.title: Quality camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is easy to use and takes great photos. It's compact and light, which is great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Elvin

customer_reviews.title: don't leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: ease of use/small but with good zoom/perfect to keep with me all the time so no shots are missed ...more features than previous models makes it even more fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use if you wish, and extremely versitile if you study up on the 300+ page manual. Wifi, tap to transfer, smartphone remote control are helpful and pretty easy to use. Small size and light weight are also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: VT Ceela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pics, great travel camera! Small, light, fits in a decent sized pocket!
customer_reviews.author: kitfoxdave

customer_reviews.title: easy to use clear pictures
customer_reviews.text: The flash is out of the way and the pictures are clear and not out of focus like our coolpix was.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll

customer_reviews.title: Works great no disappointments
customer_reviews.text: Great camera to buy. Chose to buy this model because it was rated number 1 by customer reviews. Great features.
customer_reviews.author: frank loverso

customer_reviews.title: Great compact zoom.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Lumix for small but really good camera. Have a previous model as well. 4.5
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Still using it. Good picture quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Eccles

customer_reviews.title: Great, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning about the camera but the pictures are great, good color, realistic, clear and I like the remote capability using my Android phone - seeing the picture is really neat. Love it and highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a small light good point and shoot camera!
customer_reviews.author: WEJ

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, do-everything camera.
customer_reviews.text: The sharp, long zoom lens is handy for wild life photography. This is the best camera that I have ever owned - and I have owned many of them from the Leicas, Rolleis, Nikons, Cannons, Fujis, etc. I like the GPS and WiFi features, too.
customer_reviews.author: John Arreola

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera . The zoom is great! I love that you can video watch it back pause it and take a picture! The Wi-Fi I haven't got to work yet. But it sounds like a cool feature. I do wish it came with a dummies book!
customer_reviews.author: Donna T. Morss

customer_reviews.title: I loved my old LumixDMC ZS 20
customer_reviews.text: This happens so often in the electronics world. I loved my old LumixDMC ZS 20. Got this one for higher megapixel count. Big mistake. At 16mp the 20 was a far better camera. Better resolution, better quality overall. Goodbye, Panasonic
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brooks

customer_reviews.title: My second Panasonic
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Panasonic digital. The previous was great - just several generations older. This has terrific resolution, an amazing zoom, terrific video, and all of this in a toss-it-in-your-pocket camera. Sweet. Based upon how scratched my previous viewfinder got, I put a screen protector on this one. I highly recommend you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: J. Farris

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all! Panasonic make the best cameras around. I currently have three different models. The ZS30 has by far the best video I have seen on any camera including a NEX5 and 5D that my friend uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little camera. Power hungry if all features active. Before store disable GPS and wifi otherwise you will be for a unpleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Braz

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, No viewfinder???
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, but no viewfinder available. The days of cheap looking snap shots is over due to inexpensive digital cameras, but I just don't understand why camera manufacturers expect that good pictures can be taken in BRIGHT SUNLIGHT without a proper VIEWFINDER. This is the one backward step I believe these companies take, or just ignore. To me, it just spoils the whole photo experience by leaving viewfinders out. I have one other "point and shoot" camera that has a viewfinder and one that, at least, offers a viewfinder as an extra accessory. This is not even possible with the ZS30, which is why I give it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Ben T.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a camera that is true point and shoot! BUT it also has great zoom and video features too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  T

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: - Photo quality at night is low - Battery life is low
customer_reviews.author: MAHDI

customer_reviews.title: Good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as good as advertised and rated by the on line and in print camera magazines, this Lumix is a great point-and-shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: paul a curto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i would consider is that the WEB services that the Lumix web page manages doesn't consider DropBox. Its my second LUMIX camera and wouldn't go any other way !
customer_reviews.author: Enrico

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of the Panasonic Lumix DMC series
customer_reviews.text: I have a tendency to be too physical with my cameras.When I need a replacement I turn to a newer version of the Lumix. The zoom is excellent and the quality very good. The retouch feature is a plus. I will buy another when I've damaged this one beyond repair.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Above & Below H2O prefers the Lumix
customer_reviews.text: For underwater phodeos I find the Lumix to be outstanding
customer_reviews.author: David Pressler

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS30 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: The reason I returned the camera is because even though it performed excellently, it developed a defect in the external lens shutter, which wouldn't open or close completely. Personally, I don't think such a shutter is necessary, unless there's something I don't understand about its purpose. At any rate, the shutter should be improved so as not to malfunction. Having said this, I can unreservedly recommend the camera per se.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar Phillips

customer_reviews.title: found one and am using it -- happily!!
customer_reviews.text: bought as replacement for ZS20 -- which I damaged -- but found it inferior to ZS20 and gave it to greatgranddaughter and searched for an out-of-date ZS20 somewhere/anywhere, found one and am using it -- happily !!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Schaff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I haven't experimented too much with this camera so far, but from what I have seen it has taken excellent pictures. The mobile app to control the camera is so convenient. I can't imagine having a camera without such a feature anymore! The video is super crisp and clear also. All around a great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Digital Camera.
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my wife's camera in the Gulf of Alaska while on a fishing trip and we needed a replacement. Did my research on compact digital camera's and this camera was always rated very high. We wanted something easy to use, excellent picture quality, good zoom and fast start up so we could catch a picture quickly. This camera does it all and on top of that if you are a very experienced photographer the camera has great manual setups as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Panasonic lumix to replace a three year old lumix which was taken out of my checked luggage on a Delta flight. I loved the this camera,, and this new one is not as good. The on/off buttons and the other ones are too small and hard to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sandra La Peter

customer_reviews.title: Everything perfect.....great camera
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this purchase - the camera was in the excellent condition advertised, and works perfectly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera. You can spend 6 times more and by a big camera the resaults are not going to be much different.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Leica VLUX40 which was basiclly the same camera except ZS30 has more features. The Leica cost twice as much and lasted only a few months some particals apeared inside the lense and could not be repaired and being discontinued Leica did right thing and refunded the purchase priece. I am more pleased with ZS30 it has more features. I just hope the lense will hold up. Lense is Leica!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Bayegan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite compact camera
customer_reviews.text: THe Panasonic Lumix Z series outdoes itself with each advancement with its precision pictures and broad use. For a compact, it compares favorably with largser DSLR's.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Reaves

customer_reviews.title: disapointing
customer_reviews.text: this was meant to be an upgrade for my much beloved ZS7, more zoom better in low light. It was better in low light, but the colors and pictures lacked in crispness. I was hoping to love it, but having my old camera still around to compare the exact same shots, I came to the conclusion that I'll never be really happy with it and returned it
customer_reviews.author: Mita

customer_reviews.title: Terrible pictures!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has great features, but the most important thing that ANY camera has to do is to take good pictures, and this one just doesn't. This was my most disappointing purchase in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Rush

customer_reviews.title: buy this camera is an excellent investment and high quality and highly recommended. It is an excellent product,the best decition
customer_reviews.text: buy this camera is an excellent investment and high quality and highly recommended. It is an excellent product,the best decition
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: All works fine, although, image file sizes are too large even on smallest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Drew

customer_reviews.title: Poor Manual
customer_reviews.text: Very complicated and manual is not complete or too clear on explaining several functions, Especially the Wifi part is hardly described how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Man

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this camera. The Wi-Fi does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this camera. The Wi-Fi does not work and the photos are not distinct or sharp-edged. I am upgrading to the Sony RX 100
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Lumix Masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: It's everything we wanted in a new camera. it operates fast and efficiently and the GPS is amazing. Very happy..
customer_reviews.author: John M McCombs

customer_reviews.title: Bad Battery and/or charger
customer_reviews.text: The battery that came with the camera will not take a charge or it's the actual charger that came with the camera that is not working. Going to contact the seller for a resolution today. Not to happy, needed to use it for work this week.
customer_reviews.author: Don Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Great lens but rest of the camera isn't worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Camera breaks easily. I slipped on a step while holding camera and it hit a corner from about 18 inches. Camera was broken beyond repair. Bought another one and after correctly putting on a screen protector, the LED touch screen fragmented over the entire screen. Had a Canon ELPH and an Olympus Stylus that both took more abuse over a 5 year period. The Leica lens on the Lumix is great, but I don't see much difference between 12 megapixels on the Canon and the 18 megapixels the Lumix is supposed to have. All of the wifi connectivity and other bells and whistles are more trouble than they're worth. without the Leica lens I'd only give it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS30 Digital Camera (Black)
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been amazing! I am on my 6th Panasonic Lumix and keep moving up to the next and newest model. This camera does everything and more then what I expect. I have recommended this camera to many friends and they are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget; bad camera experience
customer_reviews.text: I really like how advanced the camera is with its features but I really didn't like how slow the display respond in low light. Returned....
customer_reviews.author: AmShpr

customer_reviews.title: first Panasonic probably last buy Sony
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen never quite worked right then cracked with no damage to camera no drops or any thing to cause this. Picked it up on the third day I owned it and it had horizonal lines and then screen cracked as if before my eyes. I beleive this was either shipping damage or manufactuer defect. No response from seller and had to send off for repair still not back yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jared P.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Image Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had my ZS30 for one day before returning it. Has excellent features and boots quickly but the image quality was "soft" (i.e bad). Even my Lumix SZ7 produces better images and it's much slimmer. I only shot full auto mode with the ZS30 and didn't experiment with other settings. Subsequently purchased the Nikon P330 and am much happier with the results. Not sure about the ZS30 but the Nikon also has RAW capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great point and shoot camera, lightweight and easy to carry during travel
customer_reviews.author: Jessie J

product_meta.title: Panasonic DMC-ZS30K Lumix DMC-ZS30 Digital Camera, Compact (Black)
product_meta.description: The Panasonic LUMIX DMC-ZS30 digital camera (Black) is a versatile, high-quality compact camera with a 20x optical zoom lens, manual exposure control, Wi-Fi connectivity and touch-control LCD screen. Its 18. 1MP MOS sensor and new Venus engine image processor provide low-noise images, accurate colors and fast performance and its 20x optical zoom lens stretches from ultra wide-angle to super-telephoto lengths for a wide range of shooting applications. This Leica DC VARIO-ELMAR lens offers the 35mm equivalent focal length of a 24-480mm lens with a maximum aperture of f/3. 3 at the wide-angle end. This aperture is wide enough to capture low light action and the camera's hybrid optical image stabilization will compensate for camera shake to provide clear photos and videos when shooting at the telephoto lengths that this lens offers. If you need to reach a bit further, a 40x intelligent digital zoom feature is also available. Aspherical and extra-low dispersion lens elements and Nano surface coating minimize aberrations and flaring for sharply rendered images. full HD 1080P video recording with built-in stereo sound is supported by the ZS30 and a dedicated one-touch button will take you instantly from photo mode to video. You can also shoot still images while recording a video without cutting the video. Slow- and fast-motion video and multiple lower resolution recording is also possible and 5-axis correction minimizes blurring across the entire shooting range. A 3. 0" 920K-dot touch-control LCD screen is provided for composition and playback. You can control autofocus, zoom, shutter and playback with simple gestures on the touch-screen. It also features an auto level gauge to keep your images straight.
feature_bullets: 18. 1MP high sensitivity MOS sensor 20x Leica DC optical zoom Lens; 24-480mm
3. 0" 920K-dot touch-screen LCD display full HD 1080P/I video with stereo mic
Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity with NFC Hybrid optical image stabilization
10Fps burst shooting at full resolution manual exposure control
Digital zoom: 2.0. Display size: 3.0. Bayonet. Optical sensor resolution: 18.1. Optical zoom: 16.0

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars126 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
